default_temperature_helper: This temperature is used if no specific schedule is set for the given time, day of week, device and presence
global_schedules_helper: Global schedule for all zones. May be overridden via zone schedules.
gradual_change_duration_helper: Controls the duration (in minutes per 0.5째 or 1째F) of a gradual temperature change. The higher this value, the longe it takes to reach the taget temperature
gradual_change_duration_label: Gradual temperature change duration (in minutes per 0.5째C or 1째F)
m_descr:
This module can manage complex heating schedules with multiple zones based on time of day, day of week and presence modes.
Check github.com/maros/Zway-ThermostatControl for detailed documentation.
